The image was posted on multiple Faceboo: including a public group with over one million members, according to CrowdTangle data.
Analysis using a forensic tool from ENS: Saclay showed that the image had been manipulated and was a forgery.
The actual building is seven storeys hig: but the manipulated photo duplicated the top floor twice to make it appear taller and more dangerous.
The manipulation of the image was clumsy: with cloning and pasting evident upon cursory examination.
